title: MediaQuery
introductionEN: Establishes a subtree in which media queries resolve to the given data.
introductionCN: 建立媒体查询解析给定数据的子树。

title: Padding
introductionEN: A widget that insets its child by the given padding.
introductionCN: 一个小部件，它通过给定的填充来保护其子级。

title: Theme
introductionEN: Applies a theme to descendant widgets. A theme describes the colors and typographic choices of an application.
introductionCN: 将主题应用于后代窗口小部件。主题描述了应用程序的颜色和印刷选择。
